Text.Page:
We've received information about {@LinkCreature:18#103#Kudarsh}, the fugitive leader of the thieves who committed atrocities around Tulufan. The informant is one of the kulkaris, and according to him, Kudarsh is hiding out in Mags Kuchanaru.

Say, I don't suppose you were looking for something to do tonight?
Done, is it? Excellent. That should keep the rest at bay for a while.

Not interested in money? Well, how about your life?

No, I'm not threatening you. If Kudarsh remains the leader, they'll be everywhere. Quickly.
